text.section: The BOARD is responsible for adopting a code of student conduct.

The Principal of each building shall develop with his/her faculty and staff a means of implementing the adopted code of a student conduct for his/her school building that leads to appropriate student discipline.
Rules and regulations governing discipline and procedures for student control shall be reviewed by the Building Principal periodically with the faculty.
A Building Code of Conduct regarding discipline shall be presented to each employee at the beginning of each school year.
